name: Coinkite Bitcoin API Code for Java
body:
# coinkite-java Unofficial Coinkite Java API library https://github.com/blocktrustorg/coinkite-java

Learn more about Coinkite's API here and visit the Coinkite Main Site to open your account today!

--- [ ![Codeship Status for blocktrustorg/coinkite-java](https://codeship.io/projects/da3341f0-bdc4-0132-6764-62522b742a1f/status)](https://codeship.io/projects/72608) # coinkite-java Java Coinkite API Client https://docs.coinkite.com/api/index.html#api-table-of-contents ### Env Dependencies In order to use this library it needs to have access to your coinkite secret and public key. There are a few unittests in place to verify that you have set them correctly. In general you will want to pass them as jvm runtime arguments. java -jar <yourjarname> -DX-CK-Key=<your key> -DX-CK-Sign=<your secret key>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
